resources.string: The handicap system was changed for the 2023 season to use a new formula from Archery GB. Prior to this, tables created by David Lane were used. Use this toggle to switch between the two systems.
Use this toggle to switch between entering a handicap (current) to find the corresponding score, and entering a score to find the corresponding handicap
Use this toggle to switch between entering a handicap to find the corresponding score, and entering a score to find the corresponding handicap (current)
Enter a handicap to calculate the corresponding score
Enter a score to calculate the corresponding handicap
Specify the round to get a handicap/score for
Lists handicaps and their corresponding scores. The result of the search is highlighted
